Post.title: Linux VPSSSH
Post._content:
```
rm -rf list #######list#######
zip r list .zip ./* #######zip#######
unzip list .zip #######zip#######
wget http://www.wisay.org/list.zip ##############
/etc/init.d/nginx restart      ####### #######
kill -QUIT  #######Nginx#######
kill -TERM  #######Nginx#######
pkill -9 nginx #######Nginx#######
service nginx start #######Nginx#######
service nginx stop #######Nginx#######
service nginx restart  #######Nginx#######
service mysql start #######mysql#######
service mysql stop  #######mysql#######
```

pkill -9 nginx #######Nginx#######

Post.title: nginxssi
Post._content:
### nginx
```
cd /root/nginx-1.11.3/src/http/modules
```

### 
```
vi ngx_http_ssi_filter_module.c
```

###  2065 2067 ngx_http_parse_unsafe_uri 
```
2065 // if (ngx_http_parse_unsafe_uri(r, uri, &args, &flags) != NGX_OK) {
2066 //    return NGX_HTTP_SSI_ERROR;
2067 // }
```

### 
```
cd /root/nginx-1.11.3
./configure --prefix=/usr/local/nginx --with-poll_module --with-http_stub_status_module
 make make  make install
```

### nginx nginx 
```
cd /usr/local/nginx/sbin/
nginx ./nginx -s stop
 mv nginx /home/nginxold
```

### 5nginx/root/nginx-1.11.3/objs/usr/local/nginx/sbin/ 
```
objs cd /root/nginx-1.11.3/objs
nginxcp nginx /usr/local/nginx/sbin/nginx
```

### nginx
```
cd /usr/local/nginx/sbin/ 
./nginx
```

Post.title: [2,0,6,20,25].map(parseInt)[2, NaN, NaN, 6, 2]?
Post.raw:
---
title: '[2,0,6,20,25].map(parseInt)[2, NaN, NaN, 6, 2]?'
date: 2020-01-13 14:50:26
tags: 
- javascript
- map
- parseInt
---
### 
````
parseInt(2,0)  // 2     0 + 2 = 2
parseInt(0,1) // NaN    1 + 0 = 0 2NaN
parseInt(6,2) // NaN     601NaN
parseInt(20,3) // 6     2 * 3^1 + 0 * 3^0 = 6
parseInt(25,4) // 2     2 * 4^0 = 2 5
````

Post.title: nignx php
Post._content:
###  Nginx 
 NGINX.CONF  SERVER_TOKENS OFF;

###  PHP 
 PHP.INI 
```
;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;
; Miscellaneous ;
;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;
; Decides whether PHP may expose the fact that it is installed on the server
; (e.g. by adding its signature to the Web server header).  It is no security
; threat in any way, but it makes it possible to determine whether you use PHP
; on your server or not.
; http://www.php.net/manual/en/ini.core.php#ini.expose-php
 expose_php = Off
```
